attributes.action: Hold an immediate general election due to lack of public confidence
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout the last two years the conservatives have taken advantage of this pandemic and used it to their advantage. Whilst many had to leave loved ones to die alone, the conservatives partied without any regard for the rules they put in place! 
The public has no confidence in a leader who shows such hypocrisy and consistently goes against their own policies. 
We want the conservatives out.
attributes.background: Hold an immediate general election to replace the conservatives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
